alert.note: Alert for Clay; Effingham (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 15 at 3:49PM CDT until May 15 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Clay County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Effingham County in south central Illinois... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 349 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bible Grove, or 15 miles north of Flora, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bible Grove around 405 PM CDT. This includes Interstate 57 between mile markers 143 and 144. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
